system.appearance: Lithe or willowy build with pointed ears and four fingers and toes.

overview.base: You are immune to truth detecting effects and may give whichever response you like to them.

You become hidden. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your passive sneak ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your passive sneak.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, three-quarters cover, or some other feature which the GM determines is appropriate for being hidden. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay hidden.

overview.base: You are immune to mental effects. The effects of Mental Effect Immunity are maintained even if transformed.

Your difficult terrain, crawl, climb, hidden, and leap (both vertical and horizontal) speeds increase by 1 step.
Note: This explicitly stacks with other movement abilities such as Agile and Acrobatics.
You crawl at half speed and can Move at half speed speed while hidden. Additionally, movement effects only require a DC 10 SNK feat save to keep from breaking your hiding.
overview.proficient: You crawl at full speed and can Move at full speed while hidden.

overview.base: You are a talented tracker.
You pull an additional 5 stones from the Death Bag.
